attributes.action: recognise that the cut in VAT to 15% has had no benefit to consumers and has resulted in a greater burden for individual tax payers and therefore return it to its previous level and remove the forthcoming additional burden on taxpayers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Retail outlets determine a selling price, and then back calculate VAT. For this reason, and as a trip down any High Street will show, the vast majority of items are still priced 'to sell' - i.e. at £x.99 etc. 

As this VAT cut is expected to cost £12.5 billion, the Government should be pragmatic and ditch it now in order to reduce the coming burden on taxpayers identified in the Budget.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. Please rephrase your petition. For example, instead of using the word 'recognise' you could use the word 'end'.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
